title: Witch Hunter Robin OST Collection
description:
It seems anime music is hard to come by, these days. Nevertheless, I've uprooted another nice treasure that's pretty scarce around the net.

This file contains a compilation of all the music from the Witch Hunter Robin anime; total 48 songs including the extended ED and OP (and cover art and all that jazz):


OST 1

01 - Robin
02 - Plot
03 - Tactics
04 - Sneak
05 - Kyrie
06 - Marvelous
07 - Discord
08 - Dragnet
09 - Underground Passage
10 - Inspection
11 - Harry's
12 - Stn
13 - Open Your Eyes
14 - Dancing Type
15 - Flame
16 - Shadow
17 - Outragerous
18 - Large Crowd
19 - Flashback
20 - Allay Pain
21 - Silence
22 - Shell Tv-Edit
23 - Half Pain Tv-Edit


OST 2

01 - Say goodbye
02 - Desperte struggle
03 - Assassinator
04 - Look back
05 - Surprise attack
06 - Genetic
07 - Smuggle
08 - Emit a flash
09 - Solomon
10 - Lie
11 - Grave
12 - Duty
13 - Factory
14 - Pass
15 - Expire
16 - Witch
17 - Enigmatic person
18 - Erosion
19 - Suspiction
20 - Tragedy
21 - STNJ counter
22 - Decision
23 - Shell guitar ver.

Extended Ending:  Half Pain
Extended Opening: Shell


Enjoy! (and don't be a mooch -- SEED!)
